long_description: Carry the compact Inova X5 flashlight in a pocket or keep it stashed in your vehicle's glove compartment so you'll always have a bright light handy when the sun goes down. Stainless-steel head with individual recessed reflectors protects the 5 LEDs while directing light. LEDs output 31 lumens on high and throw a beam up to 40m. Powered by 2 CR123A lithium batteries (included), the light runs for 17 hrs. 30 min. on high and 85 hrs. on low. Regulated output maintains consistent light output over the lifetime of the batteries. Aerospace-grade aluminum body with anodized finish stands up to regular use in the outdoors; body is shockproof, crushproof and water resistant. 3-position end-cap switch activates constant and momentary high and low settings and lets you lock the light off to prevent accidental operation. Inova X5 flashlight provides IPX4 water resistance for reliability in inclement weather.
short_description: Carry the compact Inova X5 flashlight in a pocket or keep it stashed in your vehicle's glove compartment so you'll always have a bright light handy when the sun goes down.
